abstract.text: Access the system's user and group database and manage access controls.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: The Core Services Identity Reference allows developers to support user and group creation, enumeration, attribute inspection, credential management as well as group membership management in their applications.

fragments.text: (CFAllocator!, CSIdentityClass, CFString!, CFString!, CSIdentityFlags, CSIdentityAuthority!) -> Unmanaged<CSIdentity>!
